archimate:Requirement.name: TS.2.2.8: When critical or sensitive information is handled in the cloud environment (particularly when subject to regulatory requirements), the organisation should manage its own keys (e.g. in the cloud environment or within their own key management solution).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
